analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x72df2df74f60c8141058c05346d13847a62940fe.sol:
	Contract FlexibleToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x72df2df74f60c8141058c05346d13847a62940fe.sol#189-190)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x72df2df74f60c8141058c05346d13847a62940fe.sol:
